main event: A witness observed a bright object in the sky over Hatboro, Pennsylvania for approximately 40 minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared as bright as a distant searchlight and was much closer and smaller than it seemed., It was stationary but moved randomly within a limited area., The witness described seeing two white lights in the front of the object., There was no physical evidence or photographs to support the sighting., The object was reported to have disappeared straight out into space.
sighted object: a bright white object with two white lights
